timeline.bodyText: This type was created in this PR so that the AzureFileStore type can accurately say it is supported, but it will be given actual functionality in a later PR when setting blob/file attributes is added.
timeline.author: rickle-msft

timeline.bodyText: Map.of was introduced in JDK 9, this will need to be replaced with a static initializer.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Let's make this value a constant.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Would -1 or a public constant be a better value for this to have clear indication that this is a unique value and shouldn't be used to determine code paths or in validation.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: I imagine there might be scenarios where customers might try to compare the amount of space in a store with the (possibly predicted) amount of data they have. In that case, a getTotalSpace() > dataSize check would always fail. Just speculation, though. Thoughts?
replies.author: rickle-msft
